```{r}
library(rrsq)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
rsq <- RSimpleQueue$new()
rsq$get_jobs() %>% jobs_to_df()
```

```{r}
wd <- normalizePath(getwd())
jid <- rsq$submit_job(user = "devin", context = 'test job', work_dir = wd, rscript_path = "add_script.R")
rsq$get_job(jid$ID) %>% jobs_to_df()
```
